module.name: hmbseedlink
module.description: HMB-based Real-time waveform server implementing the SeedLink protocol.

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: TCP port that the server is running on.

parameter.name: connectionsPerIP
parameter.description: Maximum number of connections per IP. 0 = unlimited.

parameter.name: qlen
parameter.description: Limit backlog of records (queue length). 0 = no limit.

parameter.name: oowait
parameter.description: Wait for out-of-order data in seconds. 0 = no wait.
